CustomField.formula: 'https://www.eurostar.com/customer-dashboard/' + IF( ISPICKVAL( Invoice__r.Member__r.Preferred_Language__pc , 'English (UK)') , 'en', IF(ISPICKVAL( Invoice__r.Member__r.Preferred_Language__pc , 'French'), 'fr', IF(ISPICKVAL( Invoice__r.Member__r.Preferred_Language__pc , 'Dutch'), 'nl', IF(ISPICKVAL( Invoice__r.Member__r.Preferred_Language__pc , 'German'), 'de', 'en') ) ) ) + '/subscriptions/view-invoice?' + 'type=creditnote&' + 'orderNumber=' + Invoice__r.Order_Number__c
CustomField.label: Credit Note URL
